channel.title: Unloaded airsoft guns + cold air = no fun
channel.description:
~ IT ALL WENT DOWN LIKE DIS ~
Well, earlier today me and my friend were playing airsoft with other people, now, we have the big ass shotgun. He put it to his hand and said, wow! thats alot of air, i was like "duh..". So as it got colder and more windy, it was getting dark and the shotgun was still outside on the table, he went and grabbed it and shot it, it was empty, he took the clip out and was shooting bugs off the table with the air. Im not sure when but at some point he aimed it near his ear and shot. He walked passed me with his hand over his ear and said it hurt.. lol. I thought bullshit it isnt loaded. So i started acting dumb, pretended to shoot off both legs and limp in the grass, i went to shoot my left hand and it hurt like a bitch, the vibration went through my wrist to my hand, i held my wrist, i didnt have time to look, then his mom called my him in for dinner, and he took his hand off his ear and it was all bloody. Well, i ran home and looked at my wrist, and it was a ring of blood, on top of a welt that is as big as the fingernail on my thumb. While i was warming up inside, my friends mom came over here and told me that my friend shot the middle part of his ear off (that floppy useless part) and he is gushing blood in the bathroom. She refuses to take him to the emergency room because of his stupidity, he needs 4 stitches.
Well, the moral of this story is, gun safety also goes for POC airsoft guns also.
Sorry if you cant understand it, my wrist hurts like a mofo.
Well, obviously i cant get a picture of my friends ear, but heres one of my wrist, Its not much anymore, swelling is going down and we cleaned it a bit [URL=http://img249.imageshack.us/my.php?image=ouchiesra2.jpg][IMG]http://img249.imageshack.us/img249/3379/ouchiesra2.th.jpg[/img][/URL]

That’s good…
maybe he got lucky.

item.title: Unloaded airsoft guns + cold air = no fun
item.dc:creator: @Frell Frell
item.description:
@Frell wrote:

[quote=“cooper, post:23, topic:192700”][quote author=Frell link=topic=256491.msg2134592#msg2134592 date=1206466285]

Frell, you idiotic bastard, I love you.
Just kidding.
Anyways, if he needs the stitches, what happened? Did someone at least get him an ambulance?

No, they just controlled the bleeding until it stopped, there going to leave out stiches so he can remember what he did. lol

Its only 4, anyway. It a small gash.
[/quote]
Still, that really isn’t good for him. I understand the teaching him a lesson part but what if his ear got infected? They should at least it get looked at/sterilized…[/quote]
Well, i just saw his ear, it isnt blown off, its split open and scabbed, he still needs stitches, but he can hear.

Read full topic

item.description:

[quote=“Mopman, post:13, topic:192700”]I hate to be the boring cunt, but you really do not want one of those BB’s in your eye. Trust me. And it will happen.

The amount of close shaves I’ve had with low powered airguns has pretty much made me come to respect any weapon, however low powered it is, heh.[/quote]
I always wear eye protection, im not that dumb
